<SOURCE> Milliyet v.01 </SOURCE>
<URL> www.milliyet.com.tr/2004/04/23/son/sontur38.html </URL>
<DATE> 2004/04/23/ </DATE>
<TIME> 20.49 </TIME>
<AUTHOR>  </AUTHOR>
<HEADLINE>
Milli Piyango 23 Nisan özel çekilişi. 
</HEADLINE>
<TEXT>

     -Milli Piyango'nun, 23 Nisan özel çekilişinde, 1.5 trilyon liralık büyük ikramiye ''248510'' numaralı bilete çıktı. 
     Manisa'da yapılan çekilişte amorti rakamları 4 ve 8 olarak belirlendi. 
     Milli Piyango'nun 23 Nisan çekilişinde ikramiye kazanan numaralar şöyle 
     

23 Nisan 2004 Çekilişi Listesi 1,500,000,000,000 Lira İkramiye Kazanan Numara 248510      

100,000,000,000 Lira İkramiye Kazanan Numara 574451      

50,000,000,000 Lira İkramiye Kazanan Numara 547358      

10,000,000,000 Lira İkramiye Kazanan Numara 040564 153688 382239 594152 780660      

5,000,000,000 Lira İkramiye Kazanan Numara 134305 261496 494960 675097 724483 210461 464099 616827 705944 768226      

1,000,000,000 Lira İkramiye Kazanan Numara 004623 105243 234598 294357 442467 525048 630947 737771 005318 107231 236649 297391 450741 539316 633832 744868 017033 109335 242386 313631 456607 555173 643483 748303 025762 117978 247342 315491 460931 555303 653738 752396 041065 121239 251024 317042 466268 570979 659710 752417 047705 145241 265886 330710 482261 582736 670550 758374 063983 166406 276080 340918 490308 585812 676856 768544 068055 167885 282821 345620 502443 597861 688634 780584 077516 208949 283129 356760 504661 607305 716962 785633 081483 212132 283433 371069 506163 615940 719259 790147 091770 213702 286865 386602 516407 619655 721970 796695 098133 221499 287649 391802 524797 628584 723073 799096 104586 231974 292442 393858      

800,000,000 Lira İkramiye Kazanan Numara 000755 060932 163964 310687 433952 506477 600056 715830 004049 070778 170209 313178 440859 510853 604325 720798 008695 073320 180021 317452 443334 514622 611224 734915 010880 077860 182957 349750 444904 522520 611568 736981 013329 082218 192865 357672 445752 525839 635389 738999 021453 087387 202188 376785 454451 554019 660594 750779 023922 090653 209967 380753 458249 563479 664002 751462 026284 116422 235438 396886 458377 573143 686590 752396 026395 141824 252562 403032 459966 586819 694750 772038 037172 149036 253275 408175 470870 592385 697121 788459 041902 160391 268813 417446 502842 597383 697154 798329 046568 161362 280474 428503 504469 598261 709466 799658 060617 162681 294745 432533      

600,000,000 Lira İkramiye Kazanan Numara 001616 141146 244208 354447 481104 583684 656643 719114 005828 152234 254123 371289 481478 589920 657885 725478 008191 156309 257627 379027 482749 595141 673458 726543 014916 164628 258601 382561 483358 614999 674988 738908 022918 175874 266796 385609 528260 622744 678359 742132 065621 182141 280191 389391 549998 624834 690129 765748 067380 185066 289012 396701 551779 628373 691708 770160 075804 193074 293591 401461 554575 633695 695585 771623 096366 194252 293671 402732 560432 635887 696007 788783 099176 227903 300539 440239 560795 637125 700099 790738 113230 229730 311363 442662 562392 642799 705656 796293 124895 236554 312509 446346 568624 644836 708521 797055 131815 238535 353471 476155      

Son 3 Rakamına Göre 30,000,000 Lira İkramiye Kazanan Numara 281 327 515 720 771 902      

Son 2 Rakamına Göre 16,000,000 Lira İkramiye Kazanan Numara 07 48 54      

8,000,000 Lira İkramiye Kazanan Numara Son Rakkamı 4 Son Rakkamı 8      

1,500,000,000 Lira İkramiye Kazanan Numara 048510 241510 248010 248512 248519 248570 248910 298510 148510 242510 248110 248513 248520 248580 249510 348510 208510 243510 248210 248514 248530 248590 258510 448510 218510 244510 248310 248515 248540 248610 268510 548510 228510 245510 248410 48516 248550 248710 278510 648510 238510 246510 248500 248517 248560 248810 288510 748510 240510 247510 248511 248518      
     
</TEXT>
